sources.title: Fighting_Mad
sources.description: Download Unlimited DVD Movies @ www.ImoviesClubNow.com Fighting Mad a.k.a.Death Force (1978) 96 min - Action | Drama | Crime She's in PLAYBOY. He's out of PENITENTIARY. Jayne Kennedy and Leon Isaac in FIGHTING MAD Director: Cirio H. Santiago Writers: Howard R. Cohen (screenplay), Cirio H. Santiago (story) Stars: James Iglehart, Carmen Argenziano and Leon Isaac Kennedy Download Unlimited DVD Movies Get Instant Access @ www.ImoviesClubNow.com

metadata.Plot: After being left for dead, the man is rescued by two Japanese soldiers, living on a remote island, who teach him the ways of the samurai. Upon returning to the USA, he quickly exacts a bloody revenge on his tormentors and reunite with his wife and son.
metadata.Writer: Howard R. Cohen, Cirio H. Santiago, Robert E. Waters
metadata.Actors: James Iglehart, Carmen Argenziano, Leon Isaac Kennedy
